name: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Universal Special
overview: Pachi-Slot Monogatari: Universal Special is a pachi-slots game for the Super Famicom, released in 1994. The game features two modes: the player can choose to practice on the six machines featured in the game; or they can play through the story mode, which involves travelling around the city and playing at various pachi-slot parlors to raise money.
